name: Geon
description:
Geon is a fast moving arcade game where players race to collect pellets and deposit them in the opponent’s goal to "score". Sounds simple but your opponent will battle to stop your scoring so you will need to do the same to them. Use your cube's bash attack and shield to attack/defend. Use power-ups to boost your speed or suck up pellets. Collect and score, the first to player to score 5 goals wins the game.

Play single player time attack to earn medals, post a high score on the leader boards and win trophies or work your way through the Geon leagues. Experience the intense rush of playing against friends and family in multiplayer split screen or playing online against opponents. Team up and play a 4-player game of Team Geon or compete in a frantic match of last man standing.
